name: ACCT_NOTEPAD
description: This table contains information about the account notes.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the note record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ACCT_NOTE_TEXT
columns.description: The text of the account note. This contains the first 4000 characters of the text line.

columns.name: ACCT_NOTE_TEXT_2
columns.description: The text of the account note. This contains characters 4001 to 8000.

columns.name: ACCT_NOTE_TEXT_3
columns.description: The text of the account note. This contains characters 8001 to 12000.

columns.name: ACCT_NOTE_TEXT_4
columns.description: The text of the account note. This contains characters 12001 to 16000.

columns.name: ACCT_NOTE_TEXT_5
columns.description: The text of the account note. This contains characters 16001 to 20000.

columns.name: ACCT_NOTE_TEXT_6
columns.description: The text of the account note. This contains characters 20001 to 24000.

columns.name: ACCT_NOTE_TEXT_7
columns.description: The text of the account note. This contains characters 24001 to 28000.

columns.name: ACCT_NOTE_TEXT_8
columns.description: The text of the account note. This contains characters 28001 to 32000.
